blocks.name: hmeofn
blocks.content: The set of homeomorphisms is a function on topologies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmeofn() {
  |- wfn(chmeo, cxp(ctop, ctop))
} = {
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, chmeo, ctop, ctop, crab(hs2, co(cv(hs0), ccn, cv(hs1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs0)))))
  df-hmeo(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  rabex(hs2, co(cv(hs0), ccn, cv(hs1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs0))))
  ovex(cv(hs0), ccn, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c(co(cv(hs0), ccn, cv(hs1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hmeofn() {
  ‚ä¢ Homeo[Fn](Top √ó Top)
} = {
  fnmpt2i(hs0, hs1, chmeo, ctop, ctop, { hs2 ‚àà(hs0[Cn]hs1)| `' hs2 ‚àà(hs1[Cn]hs0)})
  df-hmeo(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  rabex(hs2, (hs0[Cn]hs1), `' hs2 ‚àà(hs1[Cn]hs0))
  ovex(hs0, ccn, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.c((hs0[Cn]hs1))
}

blocks.name: hmeofval
blocks.content: The set of all the homeomorphisms between two topologies. (Contributed by FL, 14-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmeofval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, chmeo, c1), crab(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(co(c0, chmeo, c1), crab(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0)))), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)))
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c1, ctop, chmeo, crab(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0))), crab(s0, co(cv(hs0), ccn, cv(hs1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs0)))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, co(cv(hs0), ccn, cv(hs1)), co(c0, ccn, c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs0))), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c1, ccn)
  eleq2d(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs0)), co(c1, ccn, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  ancoms(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs0)), co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  oveq12(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0), c0, ccn)
  rabex(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  ovex(c0, ccn, c1)
  eqtr4d(co(c0, chmeo, c1), crab(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0))), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop))))
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c1, ctop, chmeo, crab(s0, co(cv(hs0), ccn, cv(hs1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(cv(hs1), ccn, cv(hs0)))))
  df-hmeo(hs0, hs1, s0)
  sylibr(wn(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop))), wceq(crab(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0))), emptycls), wral(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wn(wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0)))))
  ralrimiv(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wn(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop))), wn(wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0))))
  con3rr3(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, ccn, c1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  a1d(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, ccn, c1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)))
  jca(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, ccn, c1)), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop))
  cntop1(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  cntop2(cv(s0), c0, c1)
  rabeq0(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, co(c0, ccn, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(s0)), co(c1, ccn, c0))))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), ccn, cv(hs1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, ccn, c1)
  diff.ccn.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hmeofval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[Homeo]c1)= { s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1)| `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0)}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0[Homeo]c1)= { s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1)| `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0)}, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà Top))
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c1, ctop, chmeo, { s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1)| `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0)}, { s0 ‚àà(hs0[Cn]hs1)| `' s0 ‚àà(hs1[Cn]hs0)})
  rabeqbidv(s0, (hs0[Cn]hs1), (c0[Cn]c1), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1), `' s0 ‚àà(hs1[Cn]hs0), `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  oveq12(hs0, c0, hs1, c1, ccn)
  eleq2d(`' s0, (hs1[Cn]hs0), (c1[Cn]c0), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  ancoms(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, (hs1[Cn]hs0)=(c1[Cn]c0))
  oveq12(hs1, c1, hs0, c0, ccn)
  rabex(s0, (c0[Cn]c1), `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  ovex(c0, ccn, c1)
  eqtr4d((c0[Homeo]c1), { s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1)| `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0)}, emptycls, ¬¨(c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà Top))
  mpt2ndm0(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c1, ctop, chmeo, { s0 ‚àà(hs0[Cn]hs1)| `' s0 ‚àà(hs1[Cn]hs0)})
  df-hmeo(hs0, hs1, s0)
  sylibr(¬¨(c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà Top), { s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1)| `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0)} = ‚àÖ, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1), ¬¨ `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0)))
  ralrimiv(s0, (c0[Cn]c1), ¬¨(c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà Top), ¬¨ `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  con3rr3((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà Top), s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1), `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  a1d(s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1), `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0), (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà Top))
  jca(s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1), c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà Top)
  cntop1(s0, c0, c1)
  cntop2(s0, c0, c1)
  rabeq0(s0, (c0[Cn]c1), `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1)| `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0)})
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c({ s0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1)| `' s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0)})
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, ccn, hs1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, ccn, c1)
  diff.ccn.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, (c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà Top))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà Top, c1 ‚àà Top)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, ctop)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, ctop)
  diff.ctop.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ishmeo
blocks.content: The predicate F is a homeomorphism between topology ` J ` and topology ` K ` . Proposition of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.2. (Contributed by FL, 14-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmeocn
blocks.content: A homeomorphism is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmeocnvcn
blocks.content: The converse of a homeomorphism is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmeocnv
blocks.content: The converse of a homeomorphism is a homeomorphism. (Contributed by FL, 5-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmeocnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, chmeo, c1)))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, chmeo, c1)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, ccn, c1)), wcel(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), co(c1, ccn, c2)))
  hmeocnvcn(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltrd(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), co(c1, ccn, c2), c0, wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(c0))
  3syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wrel(c0), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wf(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)))
  cnf(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  frel(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  dfrel2(c0)
  hmeocn(c0, c1, c2)
  ishmeo(ccnv(c0), c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hmeocnv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚Üí `' c0 ‚àà(c2[Homeo]c1))
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), `' c0 ‚àà(c2[Homeo]c1), `' c0 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c1), `' `' c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2))
  hmeocnvcn(c0, c1, c2)
  eqeltrd(`' `' c0, (c1[Cn]c2), c0, c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2))
  sylib(c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), `' `' c0 = c0, Rel(c0))
  3syl(c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), Rel(c0), c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c2))
  cnf(c0, c1, c2, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c2)
  frel(c0, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  dfrel2(c0)
  hmeocn(c0, c1, c2)
  ishmeo(`' c0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: hmeof1o2
blocks.content: A homeomorphism is a 1-1-onto mapping. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmeof1o2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c0, chmeo, c2))), wf1o(c4, c1, c3))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c0, chmeo, c2))), wf1o(c4, c1, c3), wfn(c4, c1), wfn(ccnv(c4), c3))
  ffnd(c4, c1, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c0, chmeo, c2))))
  syl3an3(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c0, chmeo, c2)), wf(c4, c1, c3), wcel(c4, co(c0, ccn, c2)))
  hmeocn(c4, c0, c2)
  cnf2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  ffnd(ccnv(c4), c3, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c0, chmeo, c2))))
  syl3an3(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c4, co(c0, chmeo, c2)), wf(ccnv(c4), c3, c1), wcel(ccnv(c4), co(c2, ccn, c0)))
  hmeocnvcn(c4, c0, c2)
  3com12(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(ccnv(c4), co(c2, ccn, c0)), wf(ccnv(c4), c3, c1))
  cnf2(c2, c3, c0, c1, ccnv(c4))
  dff1o4(c4, c1, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hmeof1o2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c2))‚Üí(c4 : c1 ‚Üî c3))
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c2)), (c4 : c1 ‚Üî c3), c4[Fn]c1, `' c4[Fn]c3)
  ffnd(c4, c1, c3, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c2)))
  syl3an3(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c4 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c2), (c4 : c1 ‚Üí c3), c4 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c2))
  hmeocn(c4, c0, c2)
  cnf2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  ffnd(`' c4, c3, c1, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c4 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c2)))
  syl3an3(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c4 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c2), (`' c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1), `' c4 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c0))
  hmeocnvcn(c4, c0, c2)
  3com12(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), `' c4 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c0), (`' c4 : c3 ‚Üí c1))
  cnf2(c2, c3, c0, c1, `' c4)
  dff1o4(c4, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: hmeof1o
blocks.content: A homeomorphism is a 1-1-onto mapping. (Contributed by FL, 5-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmeof1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c2))
} = {
  mpcom(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4))))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4))), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))
  hmeocn(c0, c1, c2)
  jca(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c1, ctop))
  cntop1(c0, c1, c2)
  toptopon(c1, c3)
  sylib(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4)), wcel(c2, ctop))
  cntop2(c0, c1, c2)
  toptopon(c2, c4)
  3expia(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4))
  hmeof1o2(c1, c3, c2, c4, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hmeof1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚Üí(c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4))
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c1
  ‚ä£ c4 = ‚ãÉ c2
} = {
  mpcom(c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4), (c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4)))
  syl(c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), (c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3)‚àß c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4)), c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2))
  hmeocn(c0, c1, c2)
  jca(c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4))
  sylib(c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c1 ‚àà Top)
  cntop1(c0, c1, c2)
  toptopon(c1, c3)
  sylib(c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4), c2 ‚àà Top)
  cntop2(c0, c1, c2)
  toptopon(c2, c4)
  3expia(c1 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c4), c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), (c0 : c3 ‚Üî c4))
  hmeof1o2(c1, c3, c2, c4, c0)
}

blocks.name: hmeoima
blocks.content: The image of an open set by a homeomorphism is an open set. (Contributed by FL, 5-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmeoopn
blocks.content: Homeomorphisms preserve openness. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: hmeoimaf1o
blocks.content: The function mapping open sets to their images under a homeomorphism is a bijection of topologies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmeoimaf1o(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wf1o(c3, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c1, cima(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  f1o2d(s0, hs0, c3, c1, c2, cima(c0, cv(s0)), cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)))
  hmeoima(c0, c1, c2, cv(s0))
  sylan(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c1), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))
  hmeocn(c0, c1, c2)
  cnima(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cima(c0, cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)))))
  syl12anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wb(wceq(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cima(c0, cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)))), wf1(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wss(cv(s0), cuni(c1)), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cuni(c1)))
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(s0), cuni(c1)))
  elssuni(cv(s0), c1)
  syl5sseq(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cuni(c1), cdm(c0), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  cnvimass(c0, cv(hs0))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(c1)), wf1(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wf1(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wf1o(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)))
  f1of1(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  f1dm(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  f1imaeq(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2), cv(s0), cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cima(c0, cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  eqeq2d(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cima(c0, cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(cima(c0, cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)), wfo(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wfo(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wf1o(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wf1o(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2)))

  eqid(cuni(c2))
  f1ofo(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  ad2antll(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(c2)))
  elssuni(cv(hs0), c2)

  eqcom(cima(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))
  diff.cima.s(s0, ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, chmeo, c2)

thm hmeoimaf1o(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚Üí(c3 : c1 ‚Üî c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶(c0 " s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  f1o2d(s0, hs0, c3, c1, c2, (c0 " s0), (`' c0 " hs0), c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2))
  hmeoima(c0, c1, c2, s0)

  syl12anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)), ((c0 " s0)=(c0 "(`' c0 " hs0))‚Üî s0 =(`' c0 " hs0)), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü£ ‚ãÉ c2), s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c1, (`' c0 " hs0)‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c1)
  ad2antrl(c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), s0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c1)
  elssuni(s0, c1)
  syl5sseq((`' c0 " hs0), ‚ãÉ c1, dom(c0), (c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  cnvimass(c0, hs0)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)), dom(c0)= ‚ãÉ c1, (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü£ ‚ãÉ c2))
  syl((c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü£ ‚ãÉ c2), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üî ‚ãÉ c2))
  f1of1(c0, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  f1dm(c0, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  f1imaeq(c0, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2, s0, (`' c0 " hs0))
  syl6bb((c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)), (c0 " s0)=(c0 "(`' c0 " hs0)), hs0 =(c0 " s0), (c0 " s0)= hs0)
  eqeq2d((c0 " s0), (c0 "(`' c0 " hs0)), hs0, (c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)), (c0 "(`' c0 " hs0))= hs0, (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü† ‚ãÉ c2), hs0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü† ‚ãÉ c2), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üî ‚ãÉ c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (c0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üî ‚ãÉ c2))
  hmeof1o(c0, c1, c2, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c2)
  f1ofo(c0, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c2)

  elssuni(hs0, c2)

blocks.name: hmeores
blocks.content: The restriction of a homeomorphism is a homeomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

  hmeocn(c0, c1, c2)
  cnf(c0, c1, c2, c4, cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  fssres(c0, c4, cuni(c2), c3)
  eqimss(crn(ccnv(cres(c0, c3))), c3)
  simpr(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wss(c3, c4))

  ishmeo(cres(c0, c3), co(c1, crest, c3), co(c2, crest, cima(c0, c3)))
}

blocks.name: hmeoco
blocks.content: The composite of two homeomorphisms is a homeomorphism. (Contributed by FL, 9-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmeoco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c2, chmeo, c4))), wcel(ccom(c3, c0), co(c1, chmeo, c4)))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c2, chmeo, c4))), wcel(ccom(c3, c0), co(c1, chmeo, c4)), wcel(ccom(c3, c0), co(c1, ccn, c4)), wcel(ccnv(ccom(c3, c0)), co(c4, ccn, c1)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c2, chmeo, c4)), wcel(ccom(c3, c0), co(c1, ccn, c4)), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c2, ccn, c4)))
  hmeocn(c0, c1, c2)
  hmeocn(c3, c2, c4)
  cnco(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl5eqel(ccnv(ccom(c3, c0)), co(c4, ccn, c1), ccom(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c3)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c2, chmeo, c4))))
  cnvco(c3, c0)
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c2, chmeo, c4)), wcel(ccom(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c3)), co(c4, ccn, c1)), wcel(ccnv(c3), co(c4, ccn, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, ccn, c1)))
  hmeocnvcn(c3, c2, c4)
  hmeocnvcn(c0, c1, c2)
  cnco(ccnv(c3), c4, c2, ccnv(c0), c1)
  ishmeo(ccom(c3, c0), c1, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hmeoco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà(c2[Homeo]c4))‚Üí(c3 ‚àò c0)‚àà(c1[Homeo]c4))
} = {

  syl2an(c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), c3 ‚àà(c2[Homeo]c4), (c3 ‚àò c0)‚àà(c1[Cn]c4), c0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c2), c3 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c4))
  hmeocn(c0, c1, c2)
  hmeocn(c3, c2, c4)
  cnco(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl5eqel(`'(c3 ‚àò c0), (c4[Cn]c1), (`' c0 ‚àò `' c3), (c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà(c2[Homeo]c4)))
  cnvco(c3, c0)
  syl2anr(c0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2), c3 ‚àà(c2[Homeo]c4), (`' c0 ‚àò `' c3)‚àà(c4[Cn]c1), `' c3 ‚àà(c4[Cn]c2), `' c0 ‚àà(c2[Cn]c1))
  hmeocnvcn(c3, c2, c4)
  hmeocnvcn(c0, c1, c2)
  cnco(`' c3, c4, c2, `' c0, c1)
  ishmeo((c3 ‚àò c0), c1, c4)

blocks.name: idhmeo

blocks.name: hmeocnvb
blocks.content: The converse of a homeomorphism is a homeomorphism. (Contributed by FL, 5-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmeoqtop
blocks.content: A homeomorphism is a quotient map. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

thm hmeoqtop(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)), wceq(c2, co(c1, cqtop, c0)))
} = {
  qtopomap(hs0, c2, c1, c0, cuni(c2), wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)))

  hmeocn(c0, c1, c2)

  hmeof1o(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c2))
  f1ofo(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  forn(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  hmeoima(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, co(c1, chmeo, c2)))
}

blocks.name: hmph
blocks.content: Express the predicate ` J ` is homeomorphic to ` K ` . (Contributed by FL, 14-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmphi
blocks.content: If there is a homeomorphism between spaces, then the spaces are homeomorphic. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmphtop
blocks.content: Reverse closure for the homeomorphic predicate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmphtop1
blocks.content: The relation "being homeomorphic to" implies the operands are topologies. (Contributed by FL, 23-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmphtop2
blocks.content: The relation "being homeomorphic to" implies the operands are topologies. (Contributed by FL, 23-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmphref
blocks.content: "Is homeomorphic to" is reflexive. (Contributed by FL, 25-Feb-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: hmphsym
blocks.content: "Is homeomorphic to" is symmetric. (Contributed by FL, 8-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmphsym(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wbr(c1, chmph, c0))
} = {
  sylbi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wbr(c1, chmph, c0), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1))))
  bitri(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1))), wne(co(c0, chmeo, c1), emptycls))
  hmph(c0, c1)
  n0(hs0, co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wbr(c1, chmph, c0))

  hmeocnv(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  hmphi(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c1, chmph, c0))
}

blocks.name: hmphtr
blocks.content: "Is homeomorphic to" is transitive. (Contributed by FL, 9-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmphtr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wbr(c1, chmph, c2)), wbr(c0, chmph, c2))
} = {
  syl2anb(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wbr(c1, chmph, c2), wbr(c0, chmph, c2), wne(co(c0, chmeo, c1), emptycls), wne(co(c1, chmeo, c2), emptycls))
  hmph(c0, c1)
  hmph(c1, c2)
  syl2anb(wne(co(c0, chmeo, c1), emptycls), wne(co(c1, chmeo, c2), emptycls), wbr(c0, chmph, c2), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1))), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c1, chmeo, c2))))
  n0(hs0, co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  n0(hs1, co(c1, chmeo, c2))
  sylbir(wa(wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1))), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), co(c1, chmeo, c2)))), wbr(c0, chmph, c2), wex(hs0, wex(hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c1, chmeo, c2))))))
  exdistrv(hs0, hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c1, chmeo, c2)))
  exlimivv(hs0, hs1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c1, chmeo, c2))), wbr(c0, chmph, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c1, chmeo, c2))), wbr(c0, chmph, c2), wcel(ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), co(c0, chmeo, c2)))
  hmeoco(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs1), c2)
  hmphi(ccom(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(co(c1, chmeo, c2))

  diff.hs1.w(wbr(c0, chmph, c2))
}

  diff.hs1.c((c1[Homeo]c2))

  diff.hs0.w(hs1 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c2))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c0[~ =]c2)
  diff.hs1.w(c0[~ =]c2)
}

blocks.name: hmpher
blocks.content: "Is homeomorphic to" is an equivalence relation. (Contributed by FL, 22-Mar-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmpher() {
  |- wer(chmph, ctop)
} = {
  iseri(hs0, hs1, hs2, chmph, ctop)
  mp2(wrel(chmph), wss(chmph, cxp(ctop, ctop)), wrel(cxp(ctop, ctop)))
  eqsstri(chmph, cxp(ctop, ctop), cima(ccnv(chmeo), cdif(universe, c1o)))
  df-hmph()
  sseqtri(cima(ccnv(chmeo), cdif(universe, c1o)), cxp(ctop, ctop), cdm(chmeo))
  cnvimass(chmeo, cdif(universe, c1o))
  ax-mp(wceq(cdm(chmeo), cxp(ctop, ctop)), wfn(chmeo, cxp(ctop, ctop)))
  hmeofn()
  fndm(chmeo, cxp(ctop, ctop))
  relxp(ctop, ctop)
  relss(chmph, cxp(ctop, ctop))
  hmphsym(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  hmphtr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  impbii(wcel(cv(hs0), ctop), wbr(cv(hs0), chmph, cv(hs0)))
  hmphref(cv(hs0))
  hmphtop1(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(chmph)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(chmph)
  diff.hs2.c(chmph)
}

thm hmpher() {
  ‚ä¢ ~=[Er]Top
} = {
  iseri(hs0, hs1, hs2, chmph, ctop)

blocks.name: hmphen
blocks.content: Homeomorphisms preserve the cardinality of the topologies. (Contributed by FL, 1-Jun-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmphen(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
} = {
  sylbi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wne(co(c0, chmeo, c1), emptycls))
  hmph(c0, c1)
  sylbi(wne(co(c0, chmeo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1))))
  n0(hs0, co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  syl3anc(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wbr(c0, cen, c1), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wf1o(cmpt(hs1, c0, cima(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1)))
  cntop1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1)))
  hmeocn(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  cntop2(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  hmeoimaf1o(hs1, cv(hs0), c0, c1, cmpt(hs1, c0, cima(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, c0, cima(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  f1oen2g(c0, ctop, c1, ctop, cmpt(hs1, c0, cima(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cen, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

} = {

  syl(hs0 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c1), c0 ‚àà Top, hs0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1))
  cntop1(hs0, c0, c1)
  syl(hs0 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c1), c1 ‚àà Top, hs0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1))
  hmeocn(hs0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: haushmphlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ haushmph and similar theorems. If the topological property ` A ` is preserved under injective preimages, then property ` A ` is preserved under homeomorphisms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm haushmphlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  -| wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, ctop))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wf1(cv(s0), cuni(c1), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2))), wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, ctop)))
  syl(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, chmph, c0))
  hmphsym(c0, c1)
  sylbi(wbr(c1, chmph, c0), wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wne(co(c1, chmeo, c0), emptycls))
  hmph(c1, c0)
  sylbi(wne(co(c1, chmeo, c0), emptycls), wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, chmeo, c0))))
  n0(s0, co(c1, chmeo, c0))
  exlimiv(s0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, chmeo, c0)), wi(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  expcom(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, chmeo, c0)), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, chmeo, c0))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, c2), wf1(cv(s0), cuni(c1), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, chmeo, c0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, chmeo, c0))), wf1(cv(s0), cuni(c1), cuni(c0)), wf1o(cv(s0), cuni(c1), cuni(c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, chmeo, c0)), wf1o(cv(s0), cuni(c1), cuni(c0)))
  hmeof1o(cv(s0), c1, c0, cuni(c1), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  f1of1(cv(s0), cuni(c1), cuni(c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, chmeo, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  hmeocn(cv(s0), c1, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, chmeo, c0)
  diff.chmeo.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm haushmphlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[~=]c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2))
  ‚ä£ (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Top)
  ‚ä£ ((c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(s0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü£ ‚ãÉ c0)‚àß s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0[~ =]c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)), (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Top))
  syl(c0[~ =]c1, (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2), c1[~ =]c0)
  hmphsym(c0, c1)
  sylbi(c1[~ =]c0, (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2), (c1[Homeo]c0)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  hmph(c1, c0)
  sylbi((c1[Homeo]c0)‚â† ‚àÖ, (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2), ‚àÉ(s0, s0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c0)))
  n0(s0, (c1[Homeo]c0))
  exlimiv(s0, s0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c0), (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2))
  expcom(s0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c0), c0 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c0)), c1 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà c2, (s0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü£ ‚ãÉ c0), s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c0)), (s0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Ü£ ‚ãÉ c0), (s0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üî ‚ãÉ c0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c0), (s0 : ‚ãÉ c1 ‚Üî ‚ãÉ c0))
  hmeof1o(s0, c1, c0, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c0)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c1)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  f1of1(s0, ‚ãÉ c1, ‚ãÉ c0)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(c1[Homeo]c0), s0 ‚àà(c1[Cn]c0))
  hmeocn(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, chmeo, c0)
  diff.chmeo.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, c0 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: cmphmph
blocks.content: Compactness is a topological property-that is, for any two homeomorphic topologies, either both are compact or neither is. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 30-Jun-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmphmph(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wi(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, ccmp)))
} = {
  sylbi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wi(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, ccmp)), wne(co(c0, chmeo, c1), emptycls))
  hmph(c0, c1)
  sylbi(wne(co(c0, chmeo, c1), emptycls), wi(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, ccmp)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1))))
  n0(hs0, co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wi(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, ccmp)))
  syl2anc(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wi(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, ccmp)), wfo(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1)))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wfo(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wf1o(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1)))
  hmeof1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cuni(c0), cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  f1ofo(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1))
  hmeocn(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  expcom(wa(wfo(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, ccmp))
  3expb(wcel(c0, ccmp), wfo(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1)), wcel(c1, ccmp))
  cncmp(c0, cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1), c1)
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, ccmp)))
}

thm cmphmph(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[~=]c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà Comp ‚Üí c1 ‚àà Comp))

  syl(hs0 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c1), (hs0 : ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü† ‚ãÉ c1), (hs0 : ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Üî ‚ãÉ c1))

  3expb(c0 ‚àà Comp, (hs0 : ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü† ‚ãÉ c1), hs0 ‚àà(c0[Cn]c1), c1 ‚àà Comp)

  n0(hs0, co(c0, chmeo, c1))

  hmeof1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cuni(c0), cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c0))

  expcom(wa(wfo(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(c0, cconn), wcel(c1, cconn))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cconn), wfo(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1)), wcel(c1, cconn))

blocks.origin:
thm reghmph(class c0, class c1) {

blocks.name: nrmhmph
blocks.content: Normality is a topological property. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

} = {

  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1))), wcel(c1, cnrm), wcel(c1, ctop), wral(hs3, c1, wral(hs1, cin(cfv(ccld, c1), cpw(cv(hs3))), wrex(hs2, c1, wa(wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs3)))))))

  cntop2(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  ralrimivva(hs3, hs1, c1, cin(cfv(ccld, c1), cpw(cv(hs3))), wa(wcel(c0, cnrm), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1))), wrex(hs2, c1, wa(wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), cv(hs2)), cv(hs3)))))

blocks.name: hmph0
blocks.content: A topology homeomorphic to the empty set is empty. (Contributed by FL, 18-Aug-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)

thm hmph0(class c0) {

  en1top(c0)

  diff.hs0.w(P(c2)‚äÜ c0)
  diff.hs1.c(P(c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]P(c1)))
}

blocks.name: hmphindis
blocks.content: Homeomorphisms preserve topological indiscretion. (Contributed by FL, 18-Aug-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmphindis(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls, wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c2)))
  3eqtr4a(c0, cpr(emptycls, c2), csn(emptycls), cpr(emptycls, emptycls), wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wceq(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)))
  preq2d(emptycls, c2, emptycls, wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wceq(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)))
  3eqtr4g(c2, emptycls, cuni(c0), cuni(csn(emptycls)), wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wceq(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)))
  unieqd(c0, csn(emptycls), wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wceq(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)))
  sylib(wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wceq(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)), wceq(c0, csn(emptycls)), wbr(c0, chmph, csn(emptycls)))
  biimpac(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wceq(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls), wbr(c0, chmph, csn(emptycls)))
  breq2d(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1), csn(emptycls), wceq(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls))
  syl5eqr(cpr(emptycls, c1), csn(emptycls), cpr(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), wceq(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls))
  syl6eqr(cpr(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), csn(emptycls), cpr(emptycls, emptycls), wceq(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls))
  preq2(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls, emptycls)
  dfsn2(emptycls)
  hmph0(c0)
  eqcomi(emptycls, cuni(csn(emptycls)))
  unisn(emptycls)
  simpld(wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)), wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c2)), wne(c2, emptycls))
  mpbid(wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)), wa(wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c2)), wne(c2, emptycls)), wbr(c0, cen, c2o))
  syl2an2r(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls), wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wbr(c0, cen, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wbr(cpr(emptycls, c1), cen, c2o))
  hmphen(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1))
  syl5eqbrr(cpr(emptycls, c1), cen, c2o, cpr(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)))
  indislem(c1)
  adantl(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls), wbr(cpr(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), cen, c2o))
  sylbi(wne(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls), wbr(cpr(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), cen, c2o), wne(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)))
  necom(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)
  mp3an12(wne(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), wbr(cpr(emptycls, cfv(cid, c1)), cen, c2o), wcel(emptycls, universe), wcel(cfv(cid, c1), universe))
  0ex()
  fvex(cid, c1)
  pr2nelem(emptycls, universe, cfv(cid, c1), universe)
  entr(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1), c2o)
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)), wb(wbr(c0, cen, c2o), wa(wceq(c0, cpr(emptycls, c2)), wne(c2, emptycls))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  sylib(wa(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  adantr(wbr(c0, chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wne(cfv(cid, c1), emptycls), wcel(c0, ctop))
  hmphtop1(c0, cpr(emptycls, c1))
  toptopon(c0, c2)
  en2top(c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hmphindis(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[~=]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚Üí c0 = { ‚àÖ, c2 })
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0
} = {
  pm2.61dane((= ` c1), emptycls, c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }, c0 = { ‚àÖ, c2 })
  3eqtr4a(c0, { ‚àÖ, c2 }, { ‚àÖ }, { ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ }, (c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)= ‚àÖ))
  preq2d(emptycls, c2, emptycls, (c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)= ‚àÖ))
  3eqtr4g(c2, emptycls, ‚ãÉ c0, ‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ }, (c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)= ‚àÖ))
  unieqd(c0, { ‚àÖ }, (c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)= ‚àÖ))
  sylib((c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)= ‚àÖ), c0 = { ‚àÖ }, c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ })
  biimpac(c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }, (= ` c1)= ‚àÖ, c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ })
  breq2d(c0, chmph, { ‚àÖ, c1 }, { ‚àÖ }, (= ` c1)= ‚àÖ)
  syl5eqr({ ‚àÖ, c1 }, { ‚àÖ }, { ‚àÖ,(= ` c1)}, (= ` c1)= ‚àÖ)
  syl6eqr({ ‚àÖ,(= ` c1)}, { ‚àÖ }, { ‚àÖ, ‚àÖ }, (= ` c1)= ‚àÖ)
  preq2((= ` c1), emptycls, emptycls)
  dfsn2(emptycls)
  hmph0(c0)
  eqcomi(emptycls, ‚ãÉ { ‚àÖ })
  unisn(emptycls)
  simpld((c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ), c0 = { ‚àÖ, c2 }, c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  mpbid((c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ), (c0 = { ‚àÖ, c2 } ‚àß c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ), c0[‚âÖ]2o)
  syl2an2r(c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }, (= ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, c0[‚âÖ]2o, c0[‚âÖ]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }, { ‚àÖ, c1 }[‚âÖ]2o)
  hmphen(c0, { ‚àÖ, c1 })
  syl5eqbrr({ ‚àÖ, c1 }, cen, c2o, { ‚àÖ,(= ` c1)}, (c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ))
  indislem(c1)
  adantl(c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }, (= ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, { ‚àÖ,(= ` c1)}[‚âÖ]2o)
  sylbi((= ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, { ‚àÖ,(= ` c1)}[‚âÖ]2o, ‚àÖ ‚â†(= ` c1))
  necom((= ` c1), emptycls)
  mp3an12(‚àÖ ‚â†(= ` c1), { ‚àÖ,(= ` c1)}[‚âÖ]2o, ‚àÖ ‚àà ùïå, (= ` c1)‚àà ùïå)
  0ex()
  fvex(cid, c1)
  pr2nelem(emptycls, universe, (= ` c1), universe)
  entr(c0, { ‚àÖ, c1 }, c2o)
  syl((c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ), (c0[‚âÖ]2o ‚Üî(c0 = { ‚àÖ, c2 } ‚àß c2 ‚â† ‚àÖ)), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2))
  sylib((c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àß(= ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c2), c0 ‚àà Top)
  adantr(c0[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }, (= ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà Top)
  hmphtop1(c0, { ‚àÖ, c1 })
  toptopon(c0, c2)
  en2top(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: indishmph
blocks.content: Equinumerous sets equipped with their indiscrete topologies are homeomorphic (which means in that particular case that a segment is homeomorphic to a circle contrary to what Wikipedia claims). (Contributed by FL, 17-Aug-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm indishmph(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(cpr(emptycls, c0), chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)))
} = {
  sylbi(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(cpr(emptycls, c0), chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1)))
  bren(hs0, c0, c1)
  exlimiv(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wbr(cpr(emptycls, c0), chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)))
  syl(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wbr(cpr(emptycls, c0), chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cpr(emptycls, c0), chmeo, cpr(emptycls, c1))))
  sylanbrc(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cpr(emptycls, c0), chmeo, cpr(emptycls, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cpr(emptycls, c0), ccn, cpr(emptycls, c1))), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(cpr(emptycls, c1), ccn, cpr(emptycls, c0))))
  eleqtrrd(cv(hs0), co(cpr(emptycls, c0), ccn, cpr(emptycls, c1)), co(c1, cmap, c0), wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  mpbird(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmap, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  f1of(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  elmapd(cv(hs0), c1, c0, universe, universe, wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wceq(co(cpr(emptycls, c0), ccn, cpr(emptycls, c1)), co(c1, cmap, c0)), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c0), cfv(ctopon, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  indistopon(c0, universe)
  cnindis(cpr(emptycls, c0), c0, c1, universe)
  eleqtrrd(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(cpr(emptycls, c1), ccn, cpr(emptycls, c0)), co(c0, cmap, c1), wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  mpbird(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wcel(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wf(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c1, c0))
  syl(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c1, c0), wf1o(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c1, c0))
  f1ocnv(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  f1of(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c1, c0)
  elmapd(ccnv(cv(hs0)), c0, c1, universe, universe, wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wceq(co(cpr(emptycls, c1), ccn, cpr(emptycls, c0)), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wcel(cpr(emptycls, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  sylc(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wfo(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  f1ofo(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  fornex(c0, universe, cv(hs0), c1)
  indistopon(c1, universe)
  syl6eqelr(c0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0)), wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  f1odm(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  dmex(cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  cnindis(cpr(emptycls, c1), c1, c0, universe)
  ishmeo(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, c0), cpr(emptycls, c1))
  hmphi(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, c0), cpr(emptycls, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cpr(emptycls, c0), chmph, cpr(emptycls, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm indishmph(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[‚âÖ]c1 ‚Üí { ‚àÖ, c0 }[~=]{ ‚àÖ, c1 })
} = {
  sylbi(c0[‚âÖ]c1, { ‚àÖ, c0 }[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1)))
  bren(hs0, c0, c1)
  exlimiv(hs0, (hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), { ‚àÖ, c0 }[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 })
  syl((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), { ‚àÖ, c0 }[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }, hs0 ‚àà({ ‚àÖ, c0 }[Homeo]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }))
  sylanbrc((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), hs0 ‚àà({ ‚àÖ, c0 }[Homeo]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }), hs0 ‚àà({ ‚àÖ, c0 }[Cn]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }), `' hs0 ‚àà({ ‚àÖ, c1 }[Cn]{ ‚àÖ, c0 }))
  eleqtrrd(hs0, ({ ‚àÖ, c0 }[Cn]{ ‚àÖ, c1 }), (c1[‚Ü¶]c0), (hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1))
  mpbird((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), hs0 ‚àà(c1[‚Ü¶]c0), (hs0 : c0 ‚Üí c1))
  f1of(hs0, c0, c1)
  elmapd(hs0, c1, c0, universe, universe, (hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1))
  syl2anc((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), ({ ‚àÖ, c0 }[Cn]{ ‚àÖ, c1 })=(c1[‚Ü¶]c0), { ‚àÖ, c0 } ‚àà(TopOn ` c0), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), { ‚àÖ, c0 } ‚àà(TopOn ` c0), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  indistopon(c0, universe)
  cnindis({ ‚àÖ, c0 }, c0, c1, universe)
  eleqtrrd(`' hs0, ({ ‚àÖ, c1 }[Cn]{ ‚àÖ, c0 }), (c0[‚Ü¶]c1), (hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1))
  mpbird((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), `' hs0 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]c1), (`' hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c0))
  syl((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), (`' hs0 : c1 ‚Üí c0), (`' hs0 : c1 ‚Üî c0))
  f1ocnv(hs0, c0, c1)
  f1of(`' hs0, c1, c0)
  elmapd(`' hs0, c0, c1, universe, universe, (hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1))
  syl2anc((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), ({ ‚àÖ, c1 }[Cn]{ ‚àÖ, c0 })=(c0[‚Ü¶]c1), { ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), { ‚àÖ, c1 } ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  sylc((hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1), c1 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå, (hs0 : c0 ‚Ü† c1))
  f1ofo(hs0, c0, c1)
  fornex(c0, universe, hs0, c1)
  indistopon(c1, universe)
  syl6eqelr(c0, universe, dom(hs0), (hs0 : c0 ‚Üî c1))
  f1odm(hs0, c0, c1)
  dmex(hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  cnindis({ ‚àÖ, c1 }, c1, c0, universe)
  ishmeo(hs0, { ‚àÖ, c0 }, { ‚àÖ, c1 })
  hmphi(hs0, { ‚àÖ, c0 }, { ‚àÖ, c1 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w({ ‚àÖ, c0 }[~ =]{ ‚àÖ, c1 })
}

blocks.name: hmphen2
blocks.content: Homeomorphisms preserve the cardinality of the underlying sets. (Contributed by FL, 17-Aug-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm hmphen2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c1))
} = {
  sylbi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wne(co(c0, chmeo, c1), emptycls))
  hmph(c0, c1)
  sylbi(wne(co(c0, chmeo, c1), emptycls), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1))))
  n0(hs0, co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wbr(c2, cen, c3))
  mpdan(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wbr(c2, cen, c3), wf1o(cv(hs0), c2, c3))
  hmeof1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, c3)
  f1oen3g(cv(hs0), co(c0, chmeo, c1), c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, chmeo, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c2, cen, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hmphen2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[~=]c1 ‚Üí c2[‚âÖ]c3)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ c3 = ‚ãÉ c1
} = {
  sylbi(c0[~ =]c1, c2[‚âÖ]c3, (c0[Homeo]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  hmph(c0, c1)
  sylbi((c0[Homeo]c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, c2[‚âÖ]c3, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c1)))
  n0(hs0, (c0[Homeo]c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, hs0 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c1), c2[‚âÖ]c3)
  mpdan(hs0 ‚àà(c0[Homeo]c1), c2[‚âÖ]c3, (hs0 : c2 ‚Üî c3))
  hmeof1o(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  f1oen3g(hs0, (c0[Homeo]c1), c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[Homeo]c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c2[‚âÖ]c3)
}

blocks.name: cmphaushmeo
blocks.content: A continuous bijection from a compact space to a Hausdorff space is a homeomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cmphaushmeo(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wf1o(c2, c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c1))
} = {
  impbid2(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(c2, co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wf1o(c2, c3, c4))
  hmeof1o(c2, c0, c1, c3, c4)
  syl6ibr(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wf1o(c2, c3, c4), wcel(c2, co(c0, chmeo, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wcel(ccnv(c2), co(c1, ccn, c0))))
  jctild(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wf1o(c2, c3, c4), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wcel(ccnv(c2), co(c1, ccn, c0)))
  sylibrd(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wf1o(c2, c3, c4), wcel(ccnv(c2), co(c1, ccn, c0)), wa(wf(ccnv(c2), c4, c3), wral(hs0, cfv(ccld, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccnv(c2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c1)))))
  jcad(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wf1o(c2, c3, c4), wf(ccnv(c2), c4, c3), wral(hs0, cfv(ccld, c0), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccnv(c2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c1))))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wcel(c1, cha), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wi(wf1o(c2, c3, c4), wf(ccnv(c2), c4, c3)))
  syl(wf1o(c2, c3, c4), wf(ccnv(c2), c4, c3), wf1o(ccnv(c2), c4, c3))

blocks.name: ordthmeo
blocks.content: An order isomorphism is a homeomorphism on the respective order topologies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: txhmeo
blocks.content: Lift a pair of homeomorphisms on the factors to a homeomorphism of product topologies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm txhmeo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cop(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s1)))), co(co(c4, ctx, c5), chmeo, co(c6, ctx, c7))))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c4, chmeo, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c5, chmeo, c7)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)

blocks.name: txswaphmeolem
blocks.content: Show inverse for the "swap components" operation on a Cartesian product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm txswaphmeolem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(ccom(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cmpo(s1, s0, c1, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cres(cid, cxp(c1, c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr2i(ccom(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cmpo(s1, s0, c1, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cres(cid, cxp(c1, c0)), cmpo(s1, s0, c1, c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c1, c0), cv(hs0)))
  mptru(wceq(ccom(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cmpo(s1, s0, c1, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), cmpo(s1, s0, c1, c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  fmpt2co(s1, s0, hs0, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cmpo(s1, s0, c1, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c1, c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))), wtru)
  adantl(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)))
  ancoms(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c1)))
  opelxpi(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), c1)
  eqidd(cmpo(s1, s0, c1, c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))))))
  eqcomi(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))))
  mpt2mpt(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))), cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  syl6eq(cuni(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0)))), cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), cuni(ccnv(csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  unieqd(ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))), ccnv(csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  cnveqd(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  sneq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  opswap(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  mpt2mpt(hs0, s1, s0, c1, c0, cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  mptresid(hs0, cxp(c1, c0))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, csn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.csn.s(s1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, ccnv(csn(cv(hs0))))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, csn(cv(hs0)))

  ishmeo((s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà c3 ‚Ü¶ < s1, s0 >), (c0[tX]c2), (c2[tX]c0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (TopOn ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, (TopOn ` c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c3)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, (TopOn ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, (TopOn ` c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c3)
  diff.ctopon.s(s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c3, c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c3, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c1, c3)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c3)
}

blocks.name: pt1hmeo
blocks.content: The canonical homeomorphism from a topological product on a singleton to the topology of the factor. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 18-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm pt1hmeo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))), co(c2, chmeo, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpt, csn(cop(c1, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))), co(c2, chmeo, c3)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))), co(c2, ccn, c3)), wcel(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))))), co(c3, ccn, c2)))
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))), co(c2, ccn, c3), cmpt(s0, c0, cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0)), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))), w0)
  ptcn(s0, hs0, c0, csn(c1), cv(s0), c2, c3, csn(cop(c1, c2)), universe, w0)
  eleqtrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c2, ccn, cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cv(hs0))), co(c2, ccn, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cv(s0)), co(c2, ccn, c2)))
  cnmptid(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  oveq2d(c2, ccn, cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cv(hs0)), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1))))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(csn(cop(c1, c2)), c1), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  fveq2d(csn(cop(c1, c2)), cv(hs0), c1, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  elsni(cv(hs0), c1)
  eqeltrd(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))))), co(c3, ccn, c2), cmpt(hs1, cuni(c3), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)), w0)
  eqtrd(ccnv(cmpt(s0, c0, csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))))), cmpt(hs1, cuni(c3), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)), cmpt(hs1, co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)), w0)
  mptcnv(s0, hs1, c0, csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), cfv(cv(hs1), c1), w0)
  impbida(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1))))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))))
  eqtr4d(cv(hs1), cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0)), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0)), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))
  syl5eqr(cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0)), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))), cxp(csn(c1), csn(cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fconstmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cxp(csn(c1), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c4))
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, c4, wceq(cxp(csn(c1), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  eqeq12d(cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cop(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cxp(csn(c1), csn(cv(s0))), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  xpeq1d(csn(cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s0)), csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

  fmpttd(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0), c0, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))))
  adantr(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))), wb(wcel(cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0)), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wf(cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0)), csn(c1), c0)), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(csn(c1), universe))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, c2))
  elmapg(c0, c2, csn(c1), universe, cmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cv(s0)))
  eqtr2d(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1), cfv(csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))), c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))))
  fveq1d(cv(hs1), c1, csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0)))))), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))), c1), cv(s0)), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(c1, c4))

  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c0, cfv(cv(hs1), c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)))))
  ffvelrnd(cv(hs1), c1, c0, csn(c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1))), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  eqtr4d(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cv(s0))), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs1), c1))), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)))))
  simprd(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)))), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs1), c1)))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), c1), c0))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)))), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), c1), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs1), c1))))), wf(cv(hs1), csn(c1), c0))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1)))), wf(cv(hs1), csn(c1), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))))

  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cv(hs1), c1))), wcel(c1, c4))

thm pt1hmeo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ { < c1, s0 > })‚àà(c2[Homeo]c3))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Xt_ ` { < c1, c2 > })
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(TopOn ` c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ { < c1, s0 > })‚àà(c2[Homeo]c3), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ { < c1, s0 > })‚àà(c2[Cn]c3), `'(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ { < c1, s0 > })‚àà(c3[Cn]c2))
  eqeltrrd((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ { < c1, s0 > }), (c2[Cn]c3), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(hs0 ‚àà { c1 } ‚Ü¶ s0)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (hs0 ‚àà { c1 } ‚Ü¶ s0), { < c1, s0 > }, w0)
  ptcn(s0, hs0, c0, { c1 }, s0, c2, c3, { < c1, c2 > }, universe, w0)
  eleqtrrd((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ s0), (c2[Cn]({ < c1, c2 > } ` hs0)), (c2[Cn]c2), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { c1 }))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà { c1 }, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ s0)‚àà(c2[Cn]c2))
  cnmptid(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  oveq2d(c2, ccn, ({ < c1, c2 > } ` hs0), c2, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà { c1 }))
  sylan9eqr(({ < c1, c2 > } ` hs0), c2, ({ < c1, c2 > } ` c1), w0, hs0 ‚àà { c1 })
  fveq2d({ < c1, c2 > }, hs0, c1, hs0 ‚àà { c1 })
  elsni(hs0, c1)
  eqeltrd(`'(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ { < c1, s0 > }), (c3[Cn]c2), (hs1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c3 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ` c1)), w0)
  eqtrd(`'(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ { < c1, s0 > }), (hs1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c3 ‚Ü¶(hs1 ` c1)), (hs1 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]{ c1 })‚Ü¶(hs1 ` c1)), w0)
  mptcnv(s0, hs1, c0, { < c1, s0 > }, (c0[‚Ü¶]{ c1 }), (hs1 ` c1), w0)
  impbida(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 = { < c1, s0 > }), (hs1 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]{ c1 })‚àß s0 =(hs1 ` c1)))
  jca((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 = { < c1, s0 > })), hs1 ‚àà(c0[‚Ü¶]{ c1 }), s0 =(hs1 ` c1))
  eqeltrd(hs1, (c0[‚Ü¶]{ c1 }), (hs0 ‚àà { c1 } ‚Ü¶ s0), (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 = { < c1, s0 > })))
  eqtr4d(hs1, (hs0 ‚àà { c1 } ‚Ü¶ s0), { < c1, s0 > }, (w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs1 = { < c1, s0 > })))
  adantrr(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, hs1 = { < c1, s0 > }, (hs0 ‚àà { c1 } ‚Ü¶ s0)= { < c1, s0 > })
  syl5eqr((hs0 ‚àà { c1 } ‚Ü¶ s0), { < c1, s0 > }, ({ c1 } √ó { s0 }), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  fconstmpt(hs0, { c1 }, s0)
  syl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), ({ c1 } √ó { s0 })= { < c1, s0 > }, c1 ‚àà c4)

blocks.name: ptuncnv
blocks.content: Exhibit the converse function of the map ` G ` which joins two product topologies on disjoint index sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ptunhmeo
blocks.content: Define a homeomorphism from a binary product of indexed product topologies to an indexed product topology on the union of the index sets. This is the topological analogue of ` ( A ^ B ) x. ( A ^ C ) = A ^ ( B + C ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: xpstopnlem1
blocks.content: The function ` F ` used in ~ xpsval is a homeomorphism from the binary product topology to the indexed product topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)

} = {

  xpslem(hs0, hs1, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ccnv(co(csn(cv(hs0)), ccda, csn(cv(hs1))))), co(cfv(csca, c0), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(c0), ccda, csn(c1)))), c2, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), ctps, ctps, cfv(csca, c0), wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctps)))

blocks.name: xpstopn
blocks.content: The topology on a binary product of topological spaces, as we have defined it (transferring the indexed product topology on functions on ` { (/) , 1o } ` to ` ( X X. Y ) ` by the canonical bijection), coincides with the usual topological product (generated by a base of rectangles). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: xkocnv
blocks.content: The inverse of the "currying" function ` F ` is the uncurrying function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: xkohmeo
blocks.content: The Exponential Law for topological spaces. The "currying" function ` F ` is a homeomorphism on function spaces when ` J ` and ` K ` are exponentiable spaces (by ~ xkococn , it is sufficient to assume that ` J , K ` are locally compact to ensure exponentiability). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xkohmeo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(co(c1, cxko, co(c2, ctx, c3)), chmeo, co(co(c1, cxko, c3), cxko, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c5)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, co(co(c2, ctx, c3), ccn, c1), cmpt(s1, c4, cmpt(s2, c5, co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cnlly(ccmp)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cnlly(ccmp)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ctop))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

blocks.name: qtopf1
blocks.content: If a quotient map is injective, then it is a homeomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: qtophmeo
blocks.content: If two functions on a base topology ` J ` make the same identifications in order to create quotient spaces ` J qTop F ` and ` J qTop G ` , then not only are ` J qTop F ` and ` J qTop G ` homeomorphic, but there is a unique homeomorphism that makes the diagram commute. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)

  -| wi(w0, wfo(c1, c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wfo(c2, c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(cv(s2), c3))), wb(wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cfv(c1, cv(s2))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  a1ii(wi(w0, wreu(s0, co(co(c0, cqtop, c1), chmeo, co(c0, cqtop, c2)), wceq(c2, ccom(cv(s0), c1)))), diffsc(s2, c0))

  simprl((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Cn](c0[qTop]c2))‚àß c2 =(s0 ‚àò c1))), hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c2)[Cn](c0[qTop]c1)), c1 =(hs0 ‚àò c2))
  ishmeo(s0, (c0[qTop]c1), (c0[qTop]c2))
  simprr(w0, s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Cn](c0[qTop]c2)), c2 =(s0 ‚àò c1))
  ralrimivva(s0, hs0, ((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)), ((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)), w0, ((c2 =(s0 ‚àò c1)‚àß c2 =(hs0 ‚àò c1))‚Üí s0 = hs0))
  syl5ib((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))), (c2 =(s0 ‚àò c1)‚àß c2 =(hs0 ‚àò c1)), s0 = hs0, (s0 ‚àò c1)=(hs0 ‚àò c1))
  eqtr2(c2, (s0 ‚àò c1), (hs0 ‚àò c1))
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))), ((s0 ‚àò c1)=(hs0 ‚àò c1)‚Üî s0 = hs0), (c1 : c3 ‚Ü† c4), s0[Fn]c4, hs0[Fn]c4)
  adantr(w0, (s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))), (c1 : c3 ‚Ü† c4))
  syl((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))), s0[Fn]c4, (s0 : c4 ‚Üî c4))
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))), (s0 : c4 ‚Üî c4), (c0[qTop]c1)‚àà(TopOn ` c4), (c0[qTop]c2)‚àà(TopOn ` c4), s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))
  simprl(w0, s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)), hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))
  hmeof1o2((c0[qTop]c1), c4, (c0[qTop]c2), c4, s0)
  f1ofn(s0, c4, c4)
  syl((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))), hs0[Fn]c4, (hs0 : c4 ‚Üî c4))
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))), (hs0 : c4 ‚Üî c4), (c0[qTop]c1)‚àà(TopOn ` c4), (c0[qTop]c2)‚àà(TopOn ` c4), hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))
  adantr(w0, (s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))‚àß hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2))), (c0[qTop]c1)‚àà(TopOn ` c4))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[qTop]c1)‚àà(TopOn ` c4), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), (c1 : c3 ‚Ü† c4))
  qtoptopon(c0, c3, c1, c4)

  syl2anc(w0, (c0[qTop]c2)‚àà(TopOn ` c4), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c3), (c2 : c3 ‚Ü† c4))
  qtoptopon(c0, c3, c2, c4)
  simprr(w0, s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)), hs0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c1)[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)))
  hmeof1o2((c0[qTop]c1), c4, (c0[qTop]c2), c4, hs0)
  f1ofn(hs0, c4, c4)
  cocan2(c1, c3, c4, s0, hs0)

  eqeq2d(c2, (s0 ‚àò c1), (hs0 ‚àò c1), s0 = hs0)
  coeq1(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cqtop, c2)

  diff.hs0.w(`' s0 ‚àà((c0[qTop]c2)[Cn](c0[qTop]c1)))

blocks.name: t0kq
blocks.content: A topological space is T_0 iff the quotient map is a homeomorphism onto the space's Kolmogorov quotient. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm t0kq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c2, co(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c1, crab(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbida(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c2, co(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0))))
  eleqtrrd(c2, co(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0)), co(c0, chmeo, co(c0, cqtop, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ct0)))
  qtopf1(c2, c0, c1, universe, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ct0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ct0))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ct0), wf1(c2, c1, universe))
  ist0-4(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  oveq2d(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ct0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ct0), wceq(cfv(ckq, c0), co(c0, cqtop, c2)))
  kqval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  impcom(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0))), wcel(c0, ct0))
  syl2im(wcel(c2, co(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ct0), wbr(cfv(ckq, c0), chmph, c0), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ct0))
  syl(wcel(c2, co(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0))), wbr(cfv(ckq, c0), chmph, c0), wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)))
  hmphi(c2, c0, cfv(ckq, c0))
  hmphsym(c0, cfv(ckq, c0))
  kqt0lem(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  t0hmph(cfv(ckq, c0), c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm t0kq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚Üí(c0 ‚àà Kol2 ‚Üî c2 ‚àà(c0[Homeo](KQ ` c0))))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà c0 | s0 ‚àà s1 })
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  impbida(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà Kol2, c2 ‚àà(c0[Homeo](KQ ` c0)))
  eleqtrrd(c2, (c0[Homeo](KQ ` c0)), (c0[Homeo](c0[qTop]c2)), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚àà Kol2))
  qtopf1(c2, c0, c1, universe, (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚àà Kol2))
  simpl(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà Kol2)
  biimpa(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà Kol2, (c2 : c1 ‚Ü£ ùïå))
  ist0-4(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  oveq2d(c0, chmeo, (KQ ` c0), (c0[qTop]c2), (c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1)‚àß c0 ‚àà Kol2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà Kol2, (KQ ` c0)=(c0[qTop]c2))
  kqval(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  impcom(c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c2 ‚àà(c0[Homeo](KQ ` c0)), c0 ‚àà Kol2)
  syl2im(c2 ‚àà(c0[Homeo](KQ ` c0)), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` c1), c0 ‚àà Kol2, (KQ ` c0)[~ =]c0, (KQ ` c0)‚àà Kol2)
  syl(c2 ‚àà(c0[Homeo](KQ ` c0)), (KQ ` c0)[~ =]c0, c0[~ =](KQ ` c0))
  hmphi(c2, c0, (KQ ` c0))
  hmphsym(c0, (KQ ` c0))
  kqt0lem(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  t0hmph((KQ ` c0), c0)
}

blocks.name: kqhmph
blocks.content: A topological space is T_0 iff it is homeomorphic to its Kolmogorov quotient. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kqhmph(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, ct0), wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, ct0), wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0))))
  syl(wcel(c0, ct0), wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), co(c0, chmeo, cfv(ckq, c0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  t0top(c0)
  toptopon2(c0)
  t0kq(hs0, hs1, c0, cuni(c0), cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  hmphi(cmpt(hs0, cuni(c0), crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), c0, cfv(ckq, c0))
  sylc(wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)), wcel(c0, ct0), wbr(cfv(ckq, c0), chmph, c0), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ct0))
  hmphsym(c0, cfv(ckq, c0))
  sylib(wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), ct0), wcel(c0, ctop))
  hmphtop1(c0, cfv(ckq, c0))
  kqt0(c0)
  t0hmph(cfv(ckq, c0), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm kqhmph(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Kol2 ‚Üî c0[~=](KQ ` c0))
} = {
  impbii(c0 ‚àà Kol2, c0[~ =](KQ ` c0))
  syl(c0 ‚àà Kol2, c0[~ =](KQ ` c0), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { hs1 ‚àà c0 | hs0 ‚àà hs1 })‚àà(c0[Homeo](KQ ` c0)))
  ibi(c0 ‚àà Kol2, (hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { hs1 ‚àà c0 | hs0 ‚àà hs1 })‚àà(c0[Homeo](KQ ` c0)))
  syl(c0 ‚àà Kol2, (c0 ‚àà Kol2 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { hs1 ‚àà c0 | hs0 ‚àà hs1 })‚àà(c0[Homeo](KQ ` c0))), c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c0))
  sylib(c0 ‚àà Kol2, c0 ‚àà(TopOn ` ‚ãÉ c0), c0 ‚àà Top)
  t0top(c0)
  toptopon2(c0)
  t0kq(hs0, hs1, c0, ‚ãÉ c0, (hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { hs1 ‚àà c0 | hs0 ‚àà hs1 }))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { hs1 ‚àà c0 | hs0 ‚àà hs1 }))
  hmphi((hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0 ‚Ü¶ { hs1 ‚àà c0 | hs0 ‚àà hs1 }), c0, (KQ ` c0))
  sylc(c0[~ =](KQ ` c0), c0 ‚àà Kol2, (KQ ` c0)[~ =]c0, (KQ ` c0)‚àà Kol2)
  hmphsym(c0, (KQ ` c0))
  sylib(c0[~ =](KQ ` c0), (KQ ` c0)‚àà Kol2, c0 ‚àà Top)
  hmphtop1(c0, (KQ ` c0))
  kqt0(c0)
  t0hmph((KQ ` c0), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(‚ãÉ c0)
}

blocks.name: ist1-5lem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ist1-5 and similar theorems. If ` A ` is a topological property which implies T_0, such as T_1 or T_2, the property can be "decomposed" into T_0 and a non-T_0 version of property ` A ` (which is defined as stating that the Kolmogorov quotient of the space has property ` A ` ). For example, if ` A ` is T_1, then the theorem states that a space is T_1 iff it is T_0 and its Kolmogorov quotient is T_1 (we call this property R_0). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ist1-5lem(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), c1)))
  -| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ct0))
  -| wi(wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), c1)))
  -| wi(wbr(cfv(ckq, c0), chmph, c0), wi(wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), c1), wcel(c0, c1)))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), c1)))
  jca(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), c1))
  mpcom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), c1), wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)), wcel(c0, ct0))
  imp(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, ct0), wi(wcel(cfv(ckq, c0), c1), wcel(c0, c1)), wbr(cfv(ckq, c0), chmph, c0))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, ct0), wbr(cfv(ckq, c0), chmph, c0), wbr(c0, chmph, cfv(ckq, c0)))
  kqhmph(c0)
  hmphsym(c0, cfv(ckq, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ist1-5lem(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà Kol2 ‚àß(KQ ` c0)‚àà c1))
  ‚ä£ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Kol2)
  ‚ä£ (c0[~=](KQ ` c0)‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(KQ ` c0)‚àà c1))
  ‚ä£ ((KQ ` c0)[~=]c0 ‚Üí((KQ ` c0)‚àà c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1))
} = {
  impbii(c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 ‚àà Kol2 ‚àß(KQ ` c0)‚àà c1))
  jca(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà Kol2, (KQ ` c0)‚àà c1)
  mpcom(c0 ‚àà c1, (KQ ` c0)‚àà c1, c0[~ =](KQ ` c0))
  sylib(c0 ‚àà c1, c0[~ =](KQ ` c0), c0 ‚àà Kol2)
  imp(c0 ‚àà Kol2, (KQ ` c0)‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà Kol2, ((KQ ` c0)‚àà c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1), (KQ ` c0)[~ =]c0)
  sylbi(c0 ‚àà Kol2, (KQ ` c0)[~ =]c0, c0[~ =](KQ ` c0))
  kqhmph(c0)
  hmphsym(c0, (KQ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: t1r0
blocks.content: A T_1 space is R_0. That is, the Kolmogorov quotient of a T_1 space is also T_1 (because they are homeomorphic). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: ist1-5
blocks.content: A topological space is T_1 iff it is both T_0 and R_0. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: ishaus3
blocks.content: A topological space is Hausdorff iff it is both T_0 and R_1 (where R_1 means that any two topologically distinct points are separated by neighborhoods). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: nrmreg
blocks.content: A normal T_1 space is regular Hausdorff. In other words, a T_4 space is T_3 . One can get away with slightly weaker assumptions; see ~ nrmr0reg . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: reghaus
blocks.content: A regular T_0 space is Hausdorff. In other words, a T_3 space is T_2 . A regular Hausdorff or T_0 space is also known as a T_3 space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: nrmhaus
blocks.content: A T_1 normal space is Hausdorff. A Hausdorff or T_1 normal space is also known as a T_4 space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)
